name: Fly high, lil' Ghost
description:
-+-+-+-+-

Jump higher and higher to find the lost memories of our little ghost!

Can you find all the 50 small and 5 big memories?

-+-+-+-+-

"Fly high, lil' Ghost" is a jump and run platformer I created in the last three months for university. 

The only criteria was to create something inspired from retro games, so I chose to make a cute little pixel art game! 

It was made in Unreal Engine and it was the first time I tried programming, level design and all the things it takes to create a jump and run game.  

So I hope everything works, so that you can enjoy the adventure of the small little ghost searching after her memories and peace! :D

-+-+-+-+-
